Question
========

A die is rolled 125 times. A six comes up 25 times. What is the 95% *confidence interval* for the probability *p* that this die is thrown a six?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20 ± 0.07.
* 0.20 ± 0.16.
* 0.20 ± 0.35

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20 ± 0.07.: Correct
* 0.20 ± 0.16.: Incorrect
* 0.20 ± 0.35: Incorrect
